Methods in model with parameters of type Article

          The method addArticle adds the specified article to the feed, if it is not already in the feed.
 int ArticleComparator.compare(Article a1, Article a2)
          Compare returns 1 if at was published before at, 0 if they were published at the same time, and -1 if a1 was published after a2
